entries.npc_1: Are you a customer or are you looking for work?
entries.npc_2: There's nothing that's not for sale here on Tatooine.  What do you want?
entries.npc_6: If you're that worried about it why don't you go shopping somewhere else.
entries.player_4: There's nothing I really need right now.
entries.npc_7: Well, come back if you need something.
entries.npc_3: I have all kinds of work available.  What are you good at?
entries.player_5: I'm good at lots of things.
entries.npc_4: Well, I could probably find some use for you.  You're not an imperial are you?
entries.player_7: I do have some Imperial standing.
entries.player_8: No, I'm pretty much free to work for whomever.
entries.npc_8: Sorry, I can't use you then.  Union regulations.  No Imperials.
entries.npc_9: Well, then talk to one of my friends here in the office and I'm sure they can find you some work.
entries.npc_5: Well, well, well.  A shooter, eh?  I could use a good shooter.
entries.player_9: Tell me who you want shot and I'll shoot them.
entries.npc_10: Don't jump the gun.  See if one of my friends here has a job they'd like you to do.
entries.player_10: And I could use a job.
entries.npc_11: Well, check with my employees here in the office, one of them will surely have a job for you.
